trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryOperationException class exception is thrown when an underlying directory operation fails.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryOperationException 클래스 예외는 내부 디렉터리 작업에 실패 하는 경우에 throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"> </xref> 지정된 된 오류 메시지를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class, using the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"> </xref> 클래스를 지정 된 serialization 정보를 사용 하 고 상황에 맞는 스트리밍.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object for the exception.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and an underlying exception object.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"> </xref> 된 지정된 된 오류 메시지 및 내부 예외 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains underlying exception information.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a specified error code.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"> </xref> 지정된 된 오류 메시지 및 오류 코드를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
An error code that identifies the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message, an underlying exception object, and a specified error code.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"> </xref> 된 지정된 된 오류 메시지, 내부 예외 개체 및 지정 된 오류 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains underlying exception information.
An error code that identifies the error.
Gets the error code for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 오류 코드를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that identifies the error.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 예외에 대 한 정보가 포함 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> serialize 된 예외를 throw 하는 방법에 대 한 개체 데이터를 보유 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>소스 또는 대상에 대 한 컨텍스트 정보를 포함 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
